product_name: MACM¬∑A¬∑CXIMAL Silky Matte Viva Glam Lipstick
summary: SummaryLet's keep glamming. Lets keep GIVING! Put your money where your mouth is with four shades of M¬∑A¬∑Cximal Silky Matte Lipstick. The iconic Lipstick that gives back 100% to support healthy futures and equal rights for all has been maxed out to give lips MORE with a new silky and creamy matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-wearing and color-true, 12 hoursImmediate and 8-hour moistureComfortable lipstick formulaIconic Lipstick with good-for-lips formula that looks richer, feels better and lasts longer.Key IngredientsCoconut Oil, Organic Shea & Cocoa Butter: Helps to condition and and nourish lipsFeaturesGives back 100% to promote healthy futures and equal rights for allSince 1994, M¬∑A¬∑C VIVA GLAM has raised over $520,000,000 USD globally to support women and girls, the LGBTQIA+ community and people living with or affected by HIV/AIDS.Item 2621418How To UseAPPLICATION:Apply Lipstick directly to lips.Pro tip: Define lips with Lip Pencil or layer on Lipglass for a high-shine finish.Pro tip: Dab Lipstick on cheeks for a monochomatic pop of color.REMOVAL:Dispense one to two pumps of Hyper Real Fresh Canvas Cleansing Oil into the palm of your hand and gently massage onto lips.Emulsify with warm water, rinse thoroughly and pat dry.IngredientsOctyldodecanol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Synthetic Wax, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Silica, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Lecithin, Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 28 (CI 45410), Red 30 (CI 73360), Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)] ‚â™Iln52323‚â´Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See reviews.headline: Perfect Red!!!
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a red like this for awhile now! Glides on smooth and stays!! Will buy again!!

reviews.headline: Lasts all day
reviews.comments: Perfect pink nude, not drying, lasts all day. Love it üíã

reviews.headline: Great lasting formula and colors
reviews.comments: I tried two of these based on a review by an influencer and I am impressed. Viva Planet and Viva Equality both work really well for my fair skin tone. If you have normal to dry lips (like me) - try using a light lip balm underneath for max comfort and a fresh look.  Love my new lippies! ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I bought this one along with viva heart! I adore it! If you like velvet teddy and blankety think cooler than velvet teddy and warmer than blankety a nice in between!! Any kind of light beige/brown or a taupe beige liner looks beautiful!!

reviews.headline: I love my MAC lipsticks
reviews.comments: this is a great color if you have blue undertones

reviews.headline: Perfect pinky nude
reviews.comments: If pinks pull orange on you‚Ä¶Viva Planet is your PERFECT pinky nude. I have swatched hundreds of lipsticks and liners at this point and was going to give up on finding a neutral pink. If none of the popular "neutral" pinks work for you, this is your girl!! I hope MAC makes this a permenant color

reviews.headline: I love Mac matte and this color did not disappoint'
reviews.comments: I would recommend this product to anyone. One of my new favorites

reviews.headline: I love this lip color
reviews.comments: This is an ideal shade for my everyday use. It's a very natural tone, so it let's me be casual, chill, or cute and flirty. I know it looks great on me. Some lipsticks require absolute precision or a law degree to use. This is easy to handle, doesn't smudge, and still gives great color. I love it and I hope you do too!

reviews.headline: Love the color!
reviews.comments: Feels so creamy on and smells so nice!  I want to buy more colors!

faceoff_positive.comments:
Disclaimer: I have received this product as a part of promotion in exchange of my honest review. The opinions expressed are fully mine.

Hello! I'm a 30 year old female with olive brown skin tone and I am in constant lookout for a nude/brown colour that will not wash me out. And guess what, I have found another brown lipstick that compliments my skin tone so well.
MAC lipsticks are my all time favourite as I think they have the most comfortable formula to wear all day. And Viva Equality definitely stood up to their standard. 
The packaging is like any other MAC lipsticks except for it felt heavier and more sturdy, which I loved.
The formula is creamy with a velvety touch and gives you a matte finish without drying your lips. I wore it all day for a wear test and it did stay put. Point to be noted, you might have to reapply if you eat oily food. 
The colour comes opaque. As you can see on the video, one swipe and you are good to go. 
Overall, this became my another favourite and I will definitely recommend this to everyone as I feel this would suit all skin tones.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect brown for tan skins!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been wearing this shade for years, it was my favorite until they changed the formula. I no longer buy it.  I wish they would go back to the original formula, when it was called Viva Glam II.  This new formula is too dry, and the color is a little different
faceoff_negative.headline: Viva Glam 2/Viva planet
